transcript.title: FOR PRESS: PRIME MINISTER'S SENATE CAMPAIGN MEETINGS
transcript.content:
FOR r* R 3SOC '
FP. IME MINISTER'S CENATE CAMPAIGN MEETINGS
Following are the deta'ls of the Prime Minister's public
meetings and press conferences during the Senate Camtaign:-
Thursday 9 8.30 p. m. Opening Address T. V. and radio
in all States
Public Meetings:-
Monday 13
Tuesday 14
Wednesday 15
Friday 17
Monday 2Z
Tuesday 21
Wednesday 22
Thursday 23 8. 00 p. m.
8. 00 p. m.

Norwood Town Hal! A.
Perth Forrest Flace
Launceston ( Tas.) Little Theatre
Brisbane ( Qld.) Festival Hall
Townsville ( Qld.) Wintergarden Theatre
Tamworth visit S. W.
Wagga Civic Theatre
St. Kilda ( Vic.) Town Hall
Kew Civic Hall ( Vic.) Women's Rally
Ballarat ( Vic.) Civic Hall
In addition to these meetings, the Prime Minister will make a
number of appearances on television and will give National broadcasts in
all States.
Press Conferences: Mr. Holt will also hold the following press conferences:-
Friday 10 11 a. m. Prime Minister's Cffice, Treasury Place,
Melbourne
Monday 13 11.30 a. m. Sydney ( probably at Commonwealth offices.
Tuesday 14 Noon South Australian Hotel
Wednesday 15 2.45 p. m. Esplanade Hotel, Ferth
Friday 17 2.00 p. m. Launceston Airport
Monday 2C 10. 30 a. m. Brisbane ( probably at Liberal Party Offices)
Thursday 23 11.00 a. m. VWindsor Hotel, Melbourne
CANBERRA 27th Cctober, 1967
